feature.label: eMoflon MOSL-TGG
feature.description:
This features contains plugins related to MOSL-TGG, the textual syntax of TGGs in eMoflon.
XText is a mandatory requirement and should be installed automatically.
feature.copyright: Most of our icons are from The Noun Project (http://thenounproject.com/): Emmanuel Mangatia - Les Lunettes Bleues, from The Noun Project Wrench CC-by Josh Dean, from The Noun Project Hammer by Wes Breazell from the Noun Project
